# 3000-words-list
This is a list of the 3000 most commonly used words in American newspapers and popular magazines.


## Install

```sh
$ npm install --save 3000-words-list
```


## Usage

```js
var wordsList = require('3000-words-list');
wordsList.getAll();
```
